name: Who Am I (DriftingDuck)
description:
'Who Am I ?'

This game is about beeing the monster itself.

Try to find out, who you are...!

You will find several hints per passage.

But beware: the hints are limited and sometimes not helpful.

Or more or less tricky.

After each passage, you can enter your guess.

You are always a fictive person from Movies, Series, Gaming,...

Have fun and good luck!

------------------------------------

(If you are a streamer, make sure to participate your audience!)

------------------------------------

Contribution to  TriJam 173

HTML with Twine Engine

Done in 3:15 hours (coding, writing, learning the Twine things)
